original_title: Newly Released Emails Reveal Joe Biden’s Own DOJ Red-Flagged Thousands of Last-Minute Autopen Pardons  — The Donald
article_summary: Newly released emails indicate Joe Biden's DOJ flagged thousands of last-minute autopen pardons, sparking discussions about their validity and potential abuse. Critics argue these pardons could have increased the population for political gain and question the race of those released.</s>
